title: Repeated Client Crashing

embed.description: Gyazo lets you instantly grab the screen and upload the image/GIF to the web. You can easily share them on Chat, Twitter, Blog, Tumblr, etc. Available for Windows, Mac and Linux.

body: Ever since the Riot client issues, my client **randomly** just stops working and crashes as seen from the link. **Nothing causes it**, I leave my client idle, I can go into queue, doesn't matter, **it crashes no matter what**. This issue has caused me to disconnect from 4-5 different Draft Mode champion selects, and I'm sitting at a **15 minute wait time** each time it does this. This is also in addition to the chat login errors, and the server disconnects. I've tried repairing my client, and **nothing** has been fixed. A few of my friends have this issue, but some have no problems at all.
